errorMessage.unregistered: Error: The username unregistered is not registered on this site. If you are unsure of your username, try your email address instead.
errorMessage.passwordEmpty: Error: The password field is empty.

successMessage.sentEmail: Password reset email has been sent.

text.resetPasswordBody: Lost your password? Please enter your username or email address. You will receive a link to create a new password via email.
text.dashboardSecondBody: From your account dashboard you can view your recent orders, manage your shipping and billing addresses, and edit your password and account details.
